nodes.text: Ixzinian rock rams were beasts native to the planet Pellastrallas and the Ixzinia system. They were grazing animals with an armored frill around their head and long, thick coat. They had black eyes and brown coat with white stripes along their backs. Some of them were prey of the arqet, which hunted them in the planet's forests.
Many beast masters hunted this animal for exotic animal collections and circuses.
